text: Lauren Cherie Southern (born 16 June 1995) is a Canadian alt-right political activist, and YouTuber. She was born in Surrey, British Columbia. Southern is known for making political content on YouTube. In 2015, Southern ran as a Libertarian Party candidate in the Canadian federal election. She worked for The Rebel Media until March 2017, then worked independently before announcing her retirement from political activism on 2 June 2019. Southern announced her return to YouTube on 19 June 2020. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian YouTubers Category:People from Surrey, British Columbia Category:Politicians from British Columbia
title: Lauren Southern
